turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order coffee at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which store would you like to place the order in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at Tenaya and Azure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I've located a Starbucks at Tenaya and Azure. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a white chocolate mocha, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like that in a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to customize your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have a grande, hot white chocolate mocha placed in order. Is there anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can add in a chocolate croissant?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that warmed up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell them to double toast the chocolate croissant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. One chocolate croissant, double toasted. Is there anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let's confirm your order. You ordered one grande, hot white chocolate mocha and one chocolate croissant, double toasted. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your order has been placed. It will be ready for pick up at Starbucks located at Tenaya and Azure. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you.
